page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: In our 12 km. square there are 2 places of religion. The{Methodist {chapel Craignant and St Marys church {Selattyn.}Craignant chapel is very small and only about{6 }people attend each Sunday afternoon. The chapel has been built at different times. It is mainly built out of limes stone. It has a slate roof and some of it is built out of brick . The chapel has 3 organs .The chapel has 6 rows of pews with a bible on the end of each pew. Th ogans are pedal power . The chapel has 2 yew trees out side . At St.Mary's church Selattyn 1 transept longer than the other.It is about 5 times as big as Craignant chapel .The church has a tower it has stained glass windows. .The chapel has'nt got a spire or a tower but it has a chimney.The tower was built in 1703 and the church was
